bug.author: vigneshwaran
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I have created a streamlit app with multiple pages where I used Sessionstate. The problem is button are displayed multiple times at random places. Actually they doesn't look like original buttons. The buttons are also printed in pages where they are not used. <denchmark-h:h2>Undesirable behavior:</denchmark-h>
Button like UI should not appear multiple times. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23070227/96443583-7b361380-122a-11eb-8b06-c8f52eb21ee5.png></denchmark-link>
I have not used buttons in this page. But appeared. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23070227/96443154-d4517780-1229-11eb-81bf-49ccf22c2345.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vigneshwaran>@vigneshwaran</denchmark-link> - Since SessionState is currently a community-supported feature, this question is better handled via our discussion forum: <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/>https://discuss.streamlit.io/</denchmark-link>
Best, Randy
